summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 21671, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, altering and establishing of First Avenue North, from Smith Street to Ray Street; and of Ray Street from First Avenue North to Second Avenue North, all in The City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing for that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited in the manner provided by law," approved August 23, 1909.
